item.title: OpenStreetMap, Google Maps alternative using Leaflet
item.description: In result of Google's latest updates to its Maps API services (June 11, 2018), a lot of people are unhappy with these shocking changes. Increase in the price. Decrease in the free map loads. Obligation of adding a billing account. Etc… Therefore, a lot of those people are looking to replace their use of Google Maps to something as good (or at least remotely as good).
